item.title: Can someone help me ? [PI]
item.dc:creator: @jelleplomp jelleplomp
item.description:
@jelleplomp wrote:

m getting this error : in my playerassistant.java
the error :

src\server\model\players\PlayerAssistant.java:57: error: <identifier> expected c.gearPoint = (c.gearPoint + 5000); ^ src\server\model\players\PlayerAssistant.java:62: error: <identifier> expected c.gearPoint = (c.gearPoint - 5000); ^ 2 errors Druk op een toets om door te gaan. . .
this is what i added in playerassistant.java :

public void addgearpoints() { EventManager.getSingleton().addEvent(new Event() { c.gearPoint = (c.gearPoint + 5000); }, 60000); }; public void deletegearpoints() { EventManager.getSingleton().addEvent(new Event() { c.gearPoint = (c.gearPoint - 5000); }, 59999); };

Read full topic
